title: Review quarterly budget reports
description: Analyze Q4 financials, compare against projections, and prepare summary for board meeting. Focus on **revenue growth** and cost optimization opportunities.

title: Schedule team meeting for project kickoff
description:
Coordinate with all stakeholders:
- Development team
- Design team
- Product managers
- QA team

Find suitable time slot for 2-hour session.

title: Update website homepage content
description: Refresh homepage with latest product updates and customer testimonials. Include new hero section and update call-to-action buttons.

title: Prepare presentation for client meeting
description:
Create comprehensive presentation covering:

## Project Overview
- Current status
- Key milestones achieved
- Upcoming deliverables

## Technical Implementation
- Architecture decisions
- Performance metrics
- Security measures

Include demo videos and live examples.

title: Research new project management tools
description: Evaluate alternatives to current system. Consider factors like team size, integration capabilities, and cost. Tools to research: *Asana*, *Monday.com*, *Linear*, and `Notion`.

title: Send weekly progress report to stakeholders
description: Weekly status update including completed tasks, blockers, and next week's priorities. Include metrics dashboard and team velocity chart.

title: Organize team building event
description:
Plan quarterly team building activity. Options:
1. **Escape room** - downtown location
2. **Cooking class** - hands-on experience
3. **Outdoor adventure** - weather permitting

Budget: $150 per person, survey team preferences.

title: Review and approve marketing campaign
description:
Final review of Q1 marketing materials:
- Email templates
- Social media content
- Landing page designs
- Ad copy variations

**Critical:** Ensure brand guidelines compliance and legal approval.
